--- drop_sequence.sql
DROP SEQUENCE my_sequence

--- AST
&ast.DropSequence{
  Drop:     0,
  IfExists: false,
  Name:     &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 14,
        NameEnd: 25,
        Name:    "my_sequence",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP SEQUENCE my_sequence
